page.title: 12St.NEOTS GOLF CLUB
page.content: We recorded our interview with the secretary, Mr. Walker,of St. Neots Golf Course which is south of Little Paxton.He told us that there wa 600 members of the club but fortunately they didnt all turn up to play at 8 o'clock on a Sunday morning. The club was a nine hole course and when the land was bought the previous owner was allowed to graze his pigs but had to keep them off the greens. In the next five years St.Neots is expected to grow to a population of 10 000.This means that the future of the club membership will be secure.Two celebraties have been associated with the club. One, Harry Barden, gave his name to the golfers grip.The other player being Tony Jacklin. The course has now has 18 holes.A Professional supplies, repairs and coaches, but only at the club.
